fullDescription.intro:
Returns match(es) of a substring as a new string column
Multiple return modes cn be selected (first match, last match, match by number or concat all matches)
fullDescription.option: Column you want to apply the regex to
Column you want to apply the regex to
Define which hash type should be returned -the following types are available: "HmacSHA512","HmacSHA256","HmacSHA1","HmacMD5"
